snippet: In a tearful interview from Russia, Viktor F. Yanukovych said he would try to negotiate with President Vladimir V. Putin the region’s return to Ukraine.

byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon contributed reporting from Brussels.

lead_paragraph: In a tearful interview from Russia, Viktor F. Yanukovych said he would try to negotiate with President Vladimir V. Putin the region’s return to Ukraine.

headline.main: Deposed Ukrainian Leader Calls Crimea Annexation a ‘Tragedy’
headline.print_headline: Deposed Ukrainian Leader Calls Crimea Annexation a ‘Tragedy’
